alert.note: Alert for Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gulf, southwestern Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties through 600 PM EDT/500 PM CDT/... At 529 PM EDT/429 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of Wewahitchka, or 17 miles north of Apalachicola, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Buck Siding, Dalkeith, Sumatra and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
